item.title: ActionScript Developer (mission district)
item.description:
Come work on video games and entertainment applications at Orange Design! We have a beautiful office located high above the Mission District of San Francisco.

As an ActionScript Developer you will be working on high-profile projects using ActionScript and other scripting languages.

Requirements: You must be an expert in Flash ActionScript 3.0 with at least 3 solid years of production environment experience.

Experience with the following is a plus: Flash 5.0, ActionScript 1.0, JavaScript, C/C++/C#.

Contract and full time positions considered. Must be in the San Francisco Bay Area and able to work on-site at our San Francisco studio.

Please email resume and contact information. Sorry, but phone inquiries will not be considered. Please do not respond if you are a placement agency, outsourcing firm or unable to work on-site at our San Francisco office. Thanks!
item.dc:title: ActionScript Developer (mission district)
